publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-605 John Swinburne: European Championship Play Offs-That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland football squad on the marvellous performance and result in the first leg play off against the Netherlands at Hampden, particularly the goal from James McFadden, and offers its full support to the team for the second leg in Amsterdam.
S2M-605 European Championship Play Offs (lodged on 17 November 2003) Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*

S2M-605 John Swinburne: European Championship Play Offs-That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland football squad on the marvellous performance and result in the first leg play off against the Netherlands at Hampden, particularly the goal from James McFadden, and offers its full support to the team for the second leg in Amsterdam. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil
S2M-605 European Championship Play Offs (lodged on 17 November 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
